attributes.action: Stop uk farmers being paid below production costs
attributes.additional_details: Because the buyers are not listening or responding quickly enough. Any other industry passes its production costs on to remain in business. Farmers need the same rights.
attributes.background: Farmers are  paid below production cost. increase in price takes 2-3 months to reach farmer causing constant debt . Need to be paid production cost as a constant, retailers making millions in profit and farmers  making a loss. The balance needs to be readdress and fair contracts.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the price of agricultural producers are a matter for individual agricultural businesses and those purchasing their products, not the UK Government or Parliament.
